name: battleMETAL
description:
battleMETAL is a successor to the 90's mech simulators of old. A delightful modernization of commanding giant robots bristling with firepower. Players choose and customize their war machines known as METALS, and then drop into the blighted world of Geiserath. Players will be tasked with completing a variety of mission types and they must choose the best mechs and weapons to complete their objectives. The initial campaign offers 12 missions and 4 difficulty settings. For equipment, the player can choose between 3 distinct mechs to pilot and 21 weapons/upgrades.

battleMETAL runs on the tried-and-true Quake engine via the Darkplaces source-port. Game features dynamic lighting, immersive HUDs, robust mech customization, and outdoor terrain.

Once you've conquered the 12-mission campaign, you can test your skills in multiplayer. Players can host their own private games (using port forwarding) and browse for matches. The game offers Deathmatch, Team Deathmach, and Co-op on customizable servers.

Lastly, the game is mod-friendly! Map Editor is available online, and the source code can be edited too!

Lock in and power up, DEAD_HAND.
